name: PowerKey Encrypted File
summary: Learn about .PKEY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Powerkey can carry out block encryptions of files and folders using any one of 8 well-known crypto algorithms, then compressing the data using a zip method. Upon completion of the encryption process, the user receives a file with the extension ".pkey".

description: File created by Powerkey, a highly advanced encryption toolkit with a number of unique features; created and saved as encrypted packages by Powerkey; can be used to used to hide and keep secret sensitive or private files on PCs.
